questions:

A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Industrial structures
D) Art and culture

A) In a city park
B) At a beach
C) In an industrial area
D) Inside a museum

A) A group of people
B) A landscape
C) Large industrial silos
D) A building interior

A) A tree
B) A beach
C) A large silo
D) A painting

A) Mountains
B) Ocean waves
C) Clear blue sky
D) A crowded street

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A person walking
B) A small metal structure
C) A flower garden
D) A parked car

What is the relationship between the elements in the photo?
A) The silos and the sky
B) The people and the beach

B) Snowy and cold

A) Gray
B) Blue
C) Orange
D) Green

B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

B) Metal

A) Yes, a lot

A) Bright daylight
